description:
Telegram impersonation scam: Fake "Shido official" account (profile: green "SO" icon, last seen Nov 23, 2025) tricked me into wallet approvals/transfers. Loss: ~$4,594 CAD across chains.Stolen Assets:- Solana: 3.52 SOL + 8,300 BULLISH (~$663 CAD)- Ethereum: 0.006 ETH + JOE/SHIDO/TEL tokens (~$535 CAD)- Stellar: 497.98 XLM (~$177 CAD)- XRPL: 1,159 XRP (~$3,407 CAD)Victim Wallets:- Solana: GMh123WCe6BPfDeExPadjVoRCHDNomDAZfwd5tUFvLvC- Ethereum: 0x41Fd19d5e3D430F353348965d73612185499A931- Stellar: GDP66UUYUUBVTSTDB7A...WLJTQCUS5HIFQQXXOIXZ6HEIZW- XRPL: rsYxMn6ZsTe94TBJAaNcrz3Khf47YfbcMScammer Wallets:- Solana: EkaajdZSwf4SAWLdYUdh2ZqblYUJ6j3BXRNqB8- Ethereum: 0x7773b2D4d8C490F4adbb8fAc029d33995aa068- Stellar: GAWJGLPF5MNORZBKNS44YFQFXKFBEP7HWJITYCLU45W7- XRPL: r4rVA3GZZ3bJh1zJrYrVDPBnfsYKXP23SeTx Hashes:- ETH: 0xf088e785d9b3906c45779cfa0f55084cf731fabd5897d5a16c3bf08357854df0; 0xfe74cef756e721494ff4c5c48fd217ea07a37bc64bcaae58eb9caa5b1142c8147- SOL: 5c7e9f7b8f8f8d8f8e8f8d8c8b8a8987868584838281807f7e7d7c7b7a797887f8e9d0c1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b1c2d3e4f56789abcdef1234567890abcdef1- XLM: 144f477f953dc996b651913c57c96795c5100b01b- XRP: 772EB32DE7B2C143393D937C6F54224AD640148212F57D9BBD67B6AB53C2- OKX transfer: 3wcRW4LfjCr5Z8Td92hpxcZmQm7qCxhABD8CC6ykA28oiYeinNTPDezZy4L5Whmi7ok4y2fgtWm3CYFXRHN3CqnbFunds laundered via Jupiter/Uniswap bridges.

Telegram impersonation scam: Fake "Shido official" account (profile: green "SO" icon, last seen Nov 23, 2025) tricked me into wallet approvals/transfers. Loss: ~$4,594 CAD across chains.

Stolen Assets:

- Solana: 3.52 SOL + 8,300 BULLISH (~$663 CAD)

- Ethereum: 0.006 ETH + JOE/SHIDO/TEL tokens (~$535 CAD)

- Stellar: 497.98 XLM (~$177 CAD)

- XRPL: 1,159 XRP (~$3,407 CAD)

Victim Wallets:

- Solana: GMh123WCe6BPfDeExPadjVoRCHDNomDAZfwd5tUFvLvC

- Ethereum: 0x41Fd19d5e3D430F353348965d73612185499A931

- Stellar: GDP66UUYUUBVTSTDB7A...WLJTQCUS5HIFQQXXOIXZ6HEIZW

- XRPL: rsYxMn6ZsTe94TBJAaNcrz3Khf47YfbcM
